original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3276)@</color>對前方施放尖銳的氣勁，對被打中的敵人以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3276)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3276)@</color> to cast a sharp vigor to the front, and to <color=# ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3276)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
